item.title: Interfaceãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ã®å‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ - golang
item.description: Iocã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã‚’ä½œã‚ã†ã¨ã—ã¦æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ãã¨ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‡ºã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ åŸå› ã¯interfaceã®ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ã®å‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã€‚ // interface type IFace interface { hello() string } // concrete type type Concrete struct { } func NewConcrete() *Concrete { return &Concrete{} } // - implementation func (c *Concrete) hello() string { return "Hi" } // ioc type Ioc struct { } func NewIoc() *Ioc { return &Ioc{} } // NG: this method raises error // ã“ã‚Œã¯æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒã§ã‚‹ // cannot use NewConcrete() (type *Concrete) as type *IFace in return argument: // *IFace is pointer to interface, not interface func (i *Ioc) IFace() *IFace { return NewConcrete() } // ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã¯OK func (i *Ioc) IFace() IFace { return NewConcrete() } func main() { i := NewIoc() ic := i.IFace() // ... } ã„ãã¤æ›¸ãæ›ãˆã‚‹ã¨OKã€‚ ã—ã‹ã—ç¶ºéº—ã§ã¯ãªã„ã€‚ // value receiverã«ã™ã‚‹ func (c Concrete) hello() string { return "Hi" } ... // å‹ã‚’æ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨OK func (i *Ioc) IFace() *IFace { var vif IFace var pif *IFace vif = *NewConcrete() pif = &vif return pif } structã¨åŒæ§˜ã«ã€ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚’è¿”ã—ãŸã»ã†ãŒã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã•ã‚Œã‚‹æ™‚ã®ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒä½ããªã‚‹ã‹ã¨æ€ã„ãã‚„ã€ãã‚‚ãã‚‚interfaceã¯ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿2å€‹åˆ†ãªã®ã§ãã‚Œã»ã©ã‚³ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒã‹ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã€‚ https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/N9f70MZUulk ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã¨A Tour Of Goã«ã‚‚æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¾ã™ã­â€¦â€¦ https://tour.golang.org/methods/11 å‚è€ƒ https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/N9f70MZUulk https://play.golang.org/p/5YquxHKRWL

item.title: error table [name] has no column [column]
item.description: Goã§sqliteã«ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’Insertã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã€‚ $ error table Balance has no column named price Insertã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã‚‚å•é¡Œã¯ãªã„ã€‚ ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹ã¨â€¦â€¦ 2å€‹ç›®ã®ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ ãŒãŠã‹ã—ã„ã€‚ $ sqlite3 ./some_db_file_name.sql $ PRAGMA table_info(Balance); 0|time|DATETIME|1||1 1|rate|FLOAT|0||0 2|half|FLOAT price FLOAT|0||0 3|total|FLOAT|0||0 CREATE TABLEã‚’ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹ã¨typoã§ã—ãŸã€‚ c := fmt.Sprintf(` CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS %s ( time DATETIME PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, rate FLOAT, half FLOAT price FLOAT, total FLOAT)`, Balance) DbConnection.Exec(c)
